title: (x) Schweppes logo - custom designed {Marten Fischer}
content:
Greetings,  
Does anyone have a clue what font is used in the Schweppes logo? If anyone has any insight into this it would be most appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210823im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Schweppes_6658.jpg)
author: nitjaxus

comments.content:
It's most likely custom made. It has a nice, simple art nouveau feel to it. Have a look at [Jim Spiece's fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210823/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/spiecegraphics/). Some of them has similar qualities...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110304210823im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schweppes_3741.jpg)
